comments:
NPE using Command+Space in a java file

I was trying to invoke a template that I have defined.  The template is called swtMain.  I typed swtM and 
hit Command+space.  No list appeared and the following NPE was reported in my log.

eclipse.buildId=I20050414-1107

java.vendor=Apple Computer, Inc.

-consoleLog -showlocation
